name: Jacques Delisle
biography: Born in Sherbrooke, Quebec on October 17, 1941 and graduated from l'Ecole des Beaux-Arts of Montreal in 1962.  For many years Delisle has been an illustrator and creative director for his own graphic design firm, Studio 2+2, Inc. (incorporated in 1965).  In his early career he was mainly an illustrator for print media - magazines and newspapers - and also designed cartoons, logos, brochures, and corporate annual reports.  His work also includes corporate advertising campaigns for clients in print and TV media.
